MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: var title = ".NET Primer"; var list = new List<string>;
int[] numbers = new int[42]; int number = numbers[42]; // will throw (indexes are 0-based)

Dog dog = Dog.AdoptDog(); // Returns a Dog type Pet pet = (Pet)dog; // Dog derives from Pet pet.ActCute(); Car car = (Car)dog; // will throw - no relationship between Car and Dog object temp = (object)dog; // legal - a Dog is an object car = (Car)temp; // will throw - the runtime isn't fooled car.Accelerate() // the dog won't like this, nor will the program get this far
Dog dog = Dog._nextDogToBeAdopted; // will throw - this is a private field
